channel.title: The Crowd Wisdom Sports Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
channel.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
channel.itunes:summary: The Crowd Wisdom Sports Podcast brings you fun and unique discussions about sports predictions generated through crowd wisdom. Rather than relying on one or two experts, we believe that the crowd is wiser in the long run. Each week Paul and Chris review how the crowd performed over the weekend, identify some things that the crowd got really right (and really wrong), and talk to our best predictors to see how they make their predictions.
channel.googleplay:description: The Crowd Wisdom Sports Podcast brings you fun and unique discussions about sports predictions generated through crowd wisdom. Rather than relying on one or two experts, we believe that the crowd is wiser in the long run. Each week Paul and Chris review how the crowd performed over the weekend, identify some things that the crowd got really right (and really wrong), and talk to our best predictors to see how they make their predictions.

item.title: Episode 1 - What is Crowd Wisdom Sports?
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris discuss the idea behind crowdsourcedscores.com, how crowd wisdom works and why it can be a new, fun way to watch football, as well as how you can compete in our first postseason contest.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris discuss the idea behind crowdsourcedscores.com, how crowd wisdom works and why it can be a new, fun way to watch football, as well as how you can compete in our first postseason contest.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the idea behind crowdsourcedscores.com.

item.title: Episode 2 - A Wild Card Weekend CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: This week we provide our crowd performance review (CPR) during Wild Card Weekend, what went right, and what went wrong, and how the members of the crowd may have had an effect.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we provide our crowd performance review (CPR) during Wild Card Weekend, what went right, and what went wrong, and how the members of the crowd may have had an effect.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the crowd wisdom review (CPR) for Wild Card Weekend.

item.title: Episode 3 - Divisional Round CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: The crowd came in just under .500 in the Divisional Round. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each game of the second week of the NFL postseason and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd came in just under .500 in the Divisional Round. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each game of the second week of the NFL postseason and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) in the 2018 NFL Divisional Round.

item.title: Episode 4 - Conference Championship CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: The crowd had an excellent conference championship weekend, hitting on 5 of 6 predictions. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each conference championship game and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd had an excellent conference championship weekend, hitting on 5 of 6 predictions. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each conference championship game and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) in the 2018 NFL Conference Championships.

item.title: Episode 5 - Regular Season CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris go through all of the highs and lows of the 2017 NFL Regular Season, and we highlight the select few who hit their predictions right on the money.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris go through all of the highs and lows of the 2017 NFL Regular Season, and we highlight the select few who hit their predictions right on the money.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris go through all of the highs and lows of the 2017 NFL Regular Season.

item.title: Episode 6 - Game 267 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris talk about a riveting final game and announce the big winner of the 2018 NFL Postseason Prediction Challenge.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris talk about a riveting final game and announce the big winner of the 2018 NFL Postseason Prediction Challenge.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris talk about a riveting final game and announce the big winner of the 2018 NFL Postseason Prediction Challenge.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 1 - Kickoff!
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.googleplay:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Welcome to another NFL season! We're excited to introduce our weekly prediction competition that will add a little more excitement to your NFL weekends.
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to another NFL season! We're excited to introduce our weekly prediction competition that will add a little more excitement to your NFL weekends.
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to another NFL season! We're excited to introduce our weekly prediction competition that will add a little more excitement to your NFL weekends.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 2 - Week 1 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris recap the action in Week 1 of the new NFL season and review the crowd performance while trying to stay coherent as they imbibe some nice Rye Whiskey.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris recap the action in Week 1 of the new NFL season and review the crowd performance while trying to stay coherent as they imbibe some nice Rye Whiskey.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris recap the action in Week 1 of the new NFL season and review the crowd performance while trying to stay coherent as they imbibe some nice Rye Whiskey.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 3 - Week 2 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris talk about the crowd's solid performance in Week 2 as they cover all of the games. They also discuss the race for the weekly winner title, fittingly, ended in a tie.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris talk about the crowd's solid performance in Week 2 as they cover all of the games. They also discuss the race for the weekly winner title, fittingly, ended in a tie.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris talk about the crowd's solid performance in Week 2 as they cover all of the games. They also discuss the race for the weekly winner title, fittingly, ended in a tie.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 4 - Week 3 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris discuss the craziness that was Week 3 in the NFL and cover the crowd wisdom over a new bottle of small-batch bourbon from J.P. Trodden.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris discuss the craziness that was Week 3 in the NFL and cover the crowd wisdom over a new bottle of small-batch bourbon from J.P. Trodden.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the craziness that was Week 3 in the NFL and cover the crowd wisdom over a new bottle of small-batch bourbon from J.P. Trodden.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 5 - Week 4 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Chris is joined by special guest and Week 4 champ Jordan to cover, over a bottle of Whipper Snapper Whiskey, the crowd's performance in Week 4 which was bookended by great predictions and great games.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris is joined by special guest and Week 4 champ Jordan to cover, over a bottle of Whipper Snapper Whiskey, the crowd's performance in Week 4 which was bookended by great predictions and great games.
item.itunes:summary: Chris is joined by special guest and Week 4 champ Jordan to cover, over a bottle of Whipper Snapper Whiskey, the crowd's performance in Week 4 which was bookended by great predictions and great games.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 6 - Week 5 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul is back off the IR and he and Chris knock back some Boddingtons before their teams head across the Atlantic. They also cover Week 5 which had the crowd's best performance to date.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul is back off the IR and he and Chris knock back some Boddingtons before their teams head across the Atlantic. They also cover Week 5 which had the crowd's best performance to date.
item.itunes:summary: Paul is back off the IR and he and Chris knock back some Boddingtons before their teams head across the Atlantic. They also cover Week 5 which had the crowd's best performance to date.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 7 - Week 6 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Chris mourns the Raiders lackluster performance in London, and Paul lifts his spirits with some Heritage Distilling Whiskey as they cover a great performance by the crowd in Week 6.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris mourns the Raiders lackluster performance in London, and Paul lifts his spirits with some Heritage Distilling Whiskey as they cover a great performance by the crowd in Week 6.
item.itunes:summary: Chris mourns the Raiders lackluster performance in London, and Paul lifts his spirits with some Heritage Distilling Whiskey as they cover a great performance by the crowd in Week 6.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 8 - Week 7 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris enjoy some 2Bars Whiskey as they celebrate an amazing performance by the crowd in Week 7 in which it went 12, 12, and 10 with its predictions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris enjoy some 2Bars Whiskey as they celebrate an amazing performance by the crowd in Week 7 in which it went 12, 12, and 10 with its predictions.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris enjoy some 2Bars Whiskey as they celebrate an amazing performance by the crowd in Week 7 in which it went 12, 12, and 10 with its predictions.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 9 - Week 8 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: The crowd followed up their stellar Week 7 performance with a great Week 8, so Paul and Chris go back to the well for some 2Bars Whiskey. They also review the crowd's performance as the season passes the halfway point (spoiler alert: the crowd is crushing it).
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd followed up their stellar Week 7 performance with a great Week 8, so Paul and Chris go back to the well for some 2Bars Whiskey. They also review the crowd's performance as the season passes the halfway point (spoiler alert: the crowd is crushing it).

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 10 - Week 9 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: The crowd continues to tear it up, hitting on 8 of 13 games across the board to improve their season-long accuracy numbers. Paul and Chris cover all the Week 9 games while enjoying the Macallan on the rocks.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd continues to tear it up, hitting on 8 of 13 games across the board to improve their season-long accuracy numbers. Paul and Chris cover all the Week 9 games while enjoying the Macallan on the rocks.
item.itunes:summary: The crowd continues to tear it up, hitting on 8 of 13 games across the board to improve their season-long accuracy numbers. Paul and Chris cover all the Week 9 games while enjoying the Macallan on the rocks.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 11 - Week 10 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: The crowd had a bit of a mixed bag this week, but it is still a fair bit above water. Chris and Paul talk through the crowd's Week 10 performance in each game while enjoying some Chuckanut Bay bourbon.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd had a bit of a mixed bag this week, but it is still a fair bit above water. Chris and Paul talk through the crowd's Week 10 performance in each game while enjoying some Chuckanut Bay bourbon.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 12 - Week 11 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Terrific 12 charter member Bryan Cole (thank you Bryan!) review the Week 11 crowd performance while enjoying some Clyde May's Straight Bourbon Whiskey.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Terrific 12 charter member Bryan Cole (thank you Bryan!) review the Week 11 crowd performance while enjoying some Clyde May's Straight Bourbon Whiskey.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 13 - Week 12 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Jordan, another Terrific 12 charter member (thank you Jordan!), and Chris review a good week by the crowd capped by some drama at the top of the leaderboard while also sampling some Ghost Owl Whiskey.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jordan, another Terrific 12 charter member (thank you Jordan!), and Chris review a good week by the crowd capped by some drama at the top of the leaderboard while also sampling some Ghost Owl Whiskey.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 14 - Week 13 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris are back at full strength, just in time for a full slate of games in Week 13. While sampling some more Ghost Owl Whiskey, Paul and Chris cover a solid performance by the crowd despite some crazy results.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 15 - Week 14 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul fights through flu-like symptoms (which he gets into in gory detail) to join Chris, along with some Basil Hayden Kentucky Bourbon, to cover another solid performance by the crowd in Week 14.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 16 - Week 15 CPR
item.itunes:author: Crowd Wisdom Sports
item.description: Paul brings along some John Jacob Rye from Mischief Distillery in Fremont, and he and Chris cover all of the excitement and upsets that composed a wild Week 15.
